title: NEED A XAYAH MAIN!
body: I need a xayah who will be willing to duo to gold. Just be at least S5 {{champion:498}}. I am S4 btw {{champion:497}}

replies.body: Rakan is actually pretty good on his own for solo. I am only gold myself but I think if you are looking to get good at the game you should solo so you can focus on yourself to improve instead of also taking into account the faults of your duo partner

> [{quoted}](name=HardWired,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=hAXBnhvF,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-07T07:30:45.449+0000)
>
> Rakan is actually pretty good on his own for solo. I am only gold myself but I think if you are looking to get good at the game you should solo so you can focus on yourself to improve instead of also taking into account the faults of your duo partner

Oh just realised. Cheers mate! Helps a lot :D
Hey man, I am a xayah main, m7 and accordingly to the stats tool I've got some pretty nice above average stats, im in s5, just add me and we can play anytime
